text: yudaeindeulgwa gidoggyoindeul-eun geudaega geudeul-ui jong-gyoleul ttaleugi jeonkkajineun gyeolko geudaee gwanhae heubjoghaehaji anh-eul geos-ila. geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘hananim-ui indo, geugeos-iyamallo (jinjeonghan) indola’. geudaeege jisig-i dolaehan ihuedo man-il geudaega geudeul-ui yogguleul ttaleundamyeon geudaeegeneun hananim-eul mag-a jul geu eotteon gahojana jolyeogjado eobs-eul geos-ila
